  • eclipticCoordinatesStandardJ2000

    Celestial Body Supplement See AA, p.164. In some instances, for example in meteor work, it is necessary to have the Sun’s longitude referred to the standard equinox of J2000.0. Between, 1900 and 2100, this can be performed with sufficient accuracy.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public var eclipticCoordinatesStandardJ2000: EclipticCoordinates
    Show on GitHub

Equation of Time
  • equationOfTime()

    Compute the equation of time, that is, the difference between the apparent and the mean time. Or, in other words, the difference between the hour angle of the true Sun and the mean Sun.

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func equationOfTime() -> Day

    Return Value

    The equation of time, in days.

    Show on GitHub
